alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Laurens, southern Wilkinson, northwestern Dodge, central Pulaski, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Jeffersonville to near Tarversville to near Unadilla, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Cochran, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Jeffersonville, Chester, Dexter, Dudley, Cadwell, Rentz, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Dubois, Browndale, Tarversville, Plainfield, Empire, Mobley Crossing and Roddy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson
